remarks: Ordering property for complex exponentiation.  (Contributed by Mario Carneiro, 30-May-2016.)
statement:
recxpcld.1 $e |- ( ph -> A e. RR ) $.
cxpltd.2 $e |- ( ph -> 1 < A ) $.
cxpltd.3 $e |- ( ph -> B e. RR ) $.
cxpltd.4 $e |- ( ph -> C e. RR ) $.
cxpled $p |- ( ph -> ( B <_ C <-> ( A ^c B ) <_ ( A ^c C ) ) ) $.
